articles.title: National Meeting of Workers Active in Planning Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Workers Active in Planning Held
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of workers active in planning was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday.
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the achievements, experience and lesson drawn from the drive to carry out the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on planning the national economy and discussed tasks and ways for putting the planning on a new high stage by enhancing the role of the leading economic officials and planning officials in implementing the strategic line of building an economic power set forth by the 7th Congress of the WPK and carrying out the immediate five-year strategy for national economy development.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, No Kwang Chol, Vice-Premiers Ri Mu Yong and Ko In Ho, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, ministries, national institutions, provinces, cities, counties, institutions and industrial establishment and farms and workers active in planning across the country.
					
					 O Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), conveyed "Improving and Strengthening the Planning Is Urgent Requirement for Building Socialist Economic Giant", a work made public by Marshal Kim Jong Un on September 3, Juche 105 (2016).
					
					 The work serves as important guidelines for hastening the building of an economic power by giving fuller play to the advantages of the socialist planned economy as required by the developing reality and for bringing about a new revolutionary turn in planning the national economy by raising the responsibility and the role of the leading economic officials and planning officials.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 He recalled that President Kim Il Sung made sure that the state planning institution was built for the first time in Korea on March 6, 1946 after the liberation of Korea on the basis of the valuable experience gained in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and wisely guided it, providing an eternal foundation for planning the national economy. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the President's unique idea and theory of planning as required by the times and the developing revolution and made sure that the socialist planning economy was thoroughly maintained, providing a springboard for building an economic giant, he noted
					
					 The planning of the national economy entered a new high stage under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he pointed out.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need for all the leading economic officials and planning officials to conduct an innovative economic operation and command to materialize the idea and intention of Kim Jong Un without fail.
					
					 The speakers at the meeting stressed the need to thoroughly carry out the decision made at the 7th Congress of the WPK by bringing about a fresh turn in planning with exceptional awareness and indomitable will with a firm hold on the WPK's policy of planning the national economy and thus demonstrate the great Kim Jong Un's era shining with creation and changes before the whole world.

articles.title: Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The 12th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Monday.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam, Minister of External Economic Relations Kim Yong Jae, Vice-Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Kim In Chol, officials in the fields of economy and trade, delegations of different countries and regions and diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Pak Ung Sik, manager of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, made an opening address which was followed by a congratulatory speech by O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of External Economic Relations.
					
					 Speakers said the trade fair would offer a good opportunity for promoting friendship among countries and boosting the multilateral economic and trade dealings, investment and scientific and technological exchanges.
					
					 They expressed the will to expand the economic relations with different countries of the world and steadily develop bilateral and multifaceted cooperation on the principle of equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round products presented by companies of the DPRK, Malaysia, Mongolia, Singapore, China, Thailand, Iran, Indonesia, Vietnam, Germany, Russia, Italy, Cuba, New Zealand, Australia and Taipei of China.
					
					 The fair will last till Thursday.

articles.title: Anniversary of Magazine Korean Women Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Magazine Korean Women Marked
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Magazine Korean Women observed its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The magazine has successfully carried out its duty as a powerful political weapon for strengthening the Korean women's movement and a close companion of the women during the whole period of the revolution and construction.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea President Kim Il Sung made sure that publication for women was brought out and personally named it Korean Women.
					
					 From the very day of its founding anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk led it to creditably play its role as a publication for women.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il clarified all theoretical and practical issues arising in building the revolutionary women's publication including the issue of improving the editing and style so that the magazine might preserve its features as the organ of the Central Committee of the women's union.
					
					 Magazine Korean Women has greeted a new heyday of its development under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There took place a meeting marking the anniversary on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, reporters and editors of the Working People's Organizations Publishing House and officials of the women's union.

articles.title: AFP President Here
articles.content:
AFP President Here
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) --AFP President Emmanuel Hoog and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: International Seminar on Juche Idea to Be Held Here
articles.content:
International Seminar on Juche Idea to Be Held Here
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- An international seminar of the Juche idea on anti-imperialist independence and solidarity will take place in Pyongyang on Sept. 8 with the attendance of the delegations and delegates of the Juche idea study organizations in different countries and regions. It will be sponsored by the International Institute of the Juche Idea on the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 The seminar will contribute to further promoting the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and strengthening the international solidarity among all countries and peoples in their struggle for accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of the Juche idea study organizations arrived here Monday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among them were Harish Gupta, vice-director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, a delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Chairman Dmitri Kostenko, a delegation of the Mongolian Juche idea study organization led by J. Lomvo, chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, a delegation of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics led by Chairman Sonkori Baroti, a delegation of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics led by Chairman Manik Lama and a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Chairman Songchit Pullarp.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Leaves for Colombia
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Leaves for Colombia
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the  Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) led by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the union, left here Monday to take part in the 16th Congress of the Women's International Democratic Federation to be held in Colombia.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Senegalese President Macky Sall on August 30.
					 In the message the president extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the national day of the DPRK on behalf of the government and people of Senegal and on his own behalf.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un success in his noble work and the Korean people prosperity.
					
					 He confirmed his will to make positive efforts together with Kim Jong Un to develop cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Great Persons' Feats for Development of Juche-based Education
articles.content:
Great Persons' Feats for Development of Juche-based Education
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 39th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's celebrated work "Theses on Socialist Education" (September 5, 1977).
					 The work comprehending the socialist theory of education serves as a great program for training talents and an eternal foundation for the development of the Juche-based education.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung provided the Juche-based educational idea and the revolutionary tradition of education in the flames of the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, he indicated the way for establishing the democratic and popular system of education and had worked heart and soul for the primary development of education in his lifetime.
					
					 He took measures to ensure schooling even during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War. And he saw to it that schools were built before anything else in the postwar rehabilitation period and that the universal compulsory primary and secondary education systems were enforced in the country.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had invariably adhered to the President's idea and line of attaching priority to the education.
					
					 He established the well-organized system for training talented children and instilled the educationists and rising generations with strong will to keep their feet firmly planted on their land and look out over the world.
					
					 His foresightedness and wise leadership brought about great achievements in all sectors of building a powerful socialist nation. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un authored such famous works as "Become Pillars Supporting a Prosperous Future Korea" and "Let Us Make a Revolution in Education in the New Century to Glorify Our Country as the One of Education and a Power of Talents". In the works he stressed the importance to glorify the great leaders' idea of education and their feats and indicated the orientation and ways for developing the nation's education onto a higher stage.
					
					 He made sure that the universal 12-year compulsory education was enforced in the country. And he visited newly-built educational bases one after another, giving precious teachings for further development of education. 
					
					 Under his deep care and energetic guidance, such edifices were built or remodeled as the Sci-Tech Complex, apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Songdowon International Children's Camp and Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the atmosphere of giving importance to education spread throughout the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk and Magazine Korean Women
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk and Magazine Korean Women
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's magazine Korean Women greets its 70th founding anniversary.
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung gave an instruction on founding a periodical helpful to enlightening the working women of the country.
					
					 True to his instruction, Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, had worked heart and soul.
					
					 She visited the building of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea in February 1946 to discuss on the foundation of periodical with its officials. She made clear all the issues arising in the preparations for edition and publication of the women union's organ.
					
					 In June 1946, she met with officials of the women's union and guided the compilation of women's magazine, saying that the magazine should serve as an ideological weapon to equip all the women with Kim Il Sung's idea and arouse them to the building of a new Korea.
					
					 A few days later, President Kim Il Sung called Kim Jong Suk together with officials and editors and instructed to name the magazine Korean Women.
					
					 True to his intention, Kim Jong Suk, with editors, pushed ahead with the work for founding the magazine, the organ of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 After all, the first issue of the magazine Korean Women came into being on September 6, 1946.

articles.title: Annual University Students Sports Contest in DPRK
articles.content:
Annual University Students Sports Contest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- 39 years has passed since President Kim Il Sung published his work "Theses on Socialist Education" on September 5, 1977.
					 The work refers to the essence, contents and methods of the socialist education, fundamentals of socialist pedagogy and principles to be maintained in the socialist educational work as well as to the orientation and ways for developing the socialist educational system in the DPRK.
					
					 In celebration of this day, a national university students sports contest for September 5 Prize has been held in the country every year.
					
					 The contest includes football, basketball, volleyball, defence sports, swimming, Taekwon-Do and other events.
					
					 In this year's contest held in August, students from Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering and Chongjin University of Mining showed good results.
					
					 The annual contest serves as a good occasion in glorifying the undying feats of the peerlessly great persons for the nation's educational development and displaying the vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's policies on Juche-based education and mass sports.

articles.title: Star Sister Weightlifters of DPRK
articles.content:
Star Sister Weightlifters of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rim Jong Sim and her younger sister Rim Un Sim of the DPRK are cutting a brilliant figure in the world of weightlifting.
					 They are weightlifters of the Kigwancha Sports Team and Rim Jong Sim is a twice Olympic gold medalist.
					
					 In June of the year Rim Un Sim won three gold medals in 63 kg category of the World Junior Weightlifting Championships, with a lift of 26 more kilograms in total than the runner-up.
					
					 Two months later, her elder sister Rim Jong Sim came first in 75 kg category weightlifting of the 31st Olympic Games.
					
					 She took the 69kg weightlifting title in the 30th Olympic Games. And in the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships, she injured herself while attempting third snatch and took a medical advice, but made lifts with indomitable will and was cheered by weightlifters, exports and the crowd.
					
					 Their mother Ri Yong Hui, who was an acrobat in her vernal years, told KCNA:
					
					 "My daughter Jong Sim shocked neighbors by carrying 10-kg water bucket in her nursery days.
					
					 Anyhow, it is our grateful socialist system that discovered and cultivated my daughters' talents and put forward them as world-class weightlifters. They are now at the meridian of honor."
					
					 Rim Jong Sim had an honor of participating in the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and Rim Un Sim an honor of attending the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.

articles.title: U.S. Strong-arm Policies Are Bound to Go Bankrupt: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Strong-arm Policies Are Bound to Go Bankrupt: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The present U.S. administration's ego-driven foreign policies are going belly-up one after another.
					 As regards TTIP a German vice chancellor asserted on Aug. 28 that as Europe could not cave in to the demand of the U.S., negotiations actually broke down.
					
					 This was little short of a declaration of resistance against the U.S. strong-arm policies and a herald of their bankruptcy. 
					
					 TTIP negotiations were the ones for U.S.-EU FTA pushed forward by the Obama administration to make it the best "goal" of its foreign policy since it started three years ago, being billed as the "building of the world's biggest free trade zone."
					
					 But even allies in EU turned their back on the three-year-lingering negotiations with the U.S. as they disliked its self-assertive approach to the negotiations and ego-driven pursuit of its interests. It came to rupture at last, glooming the prospect of clinch.
					
					 The Obama administration's bungling foreign policies are on the verge of going belly-up, meeting the frostiest-ever receptions not only in Europe but also in Middle East.
					
					 The deceptive Middle East policy of Obama, who committed himself to "withdrawing GIs from Iraq" and "getting reconciled with Islam," not like his predecessors, caused the turmoil of "Arab Spring" and reduced the whole Middle East region into a mayhem hit by an evil cycle of terror and reprisal.
					
					 As a result, the U.S. was branded as the world's worst human rights abuser wholly to blame for causing the worst refugee crisis.
					
					 Other foreign policies advocated by Obama including the one for "building a world without nuclear weapons" faced real flops one after another for their unfeasibility and deceptive nature.
					
					 Specifically, the Obama administration's anachronistic "strategic patience" policy aimed at "bringing down" the social system of the DPRK through sanctions and pressure went completely bankrupt and only resulted in promoting the strategic position of the DPRK as a nuclear power.
					
					 Such disgrace being suffered by the U.S. in the eyes of the world public is by no means accidental.
					
					 Sovereignty represents the vitality of a country and nation and independence is the trend of the times and history. 
					
					 The U.S. strategy for dominating the world based on strong-arm and arbitrary policies, aggression and intervention is being rejected by the world and is fated to go bankrupt as it is going against the trend of history.
					
					 Collin Murphy, former editor-in-chief of a U.S. magazine, wrote in a book that the situation of the U.S. dates back to the Roman Empire on the verge of ruin, adding the U.S. and the Roman Empire all faced a series of crisis due to their exceeding influence over other countries beyond their boundaries.
					
					 Robert Mary, a reporter of Wall Street Journal, asserted that the U.S. made a mistake by planting its flag on the core part of other nation's civilization without any reasonable pretext for igniting a war in the 21st century, adding conceptions like expansion of freedom and transplanting of democracy are no more than an item on the list of hopes.
					
					 The story about "collapse of the U.S." like "end of the 'era of the U.S.'" and "ruin of the U.S." that floated around during the period of the Bush administration has become realistic. It is an inevitability of history that the world will witness it.
					
					 With the passage of the time the world will clearly witness the final ruin of the U.S. along with the bankruptcy of its notorious hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Is Arch Criminal Disturbing Peace, Stability: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Arch Criminal Disturbing Peace, Stability: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Though the U.S. tries hard to paint its joint military drill as a "defensive one," it can never cover up its criminal nature.
					 The just ended U.S.-south Korea joint military drill was a nuclear war drill to conquer the DPRK by force of arms and establish military hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region from A to Z.
					
					 It was clearly evidenced by the goal and contents of the drill staged pursuant to operation plan and its ever-escalating scale and methods.
					
					 An expert of the Russian Academy of Sciences said:
					
					 The U.S. advertises that the Ulji Freedom Guardian is "one for protecting democracy" but it is quite different from its "defensive purpose" as the drill scenarios including "the operation for occupying Pyongyang" and "beheading operation" for "removing the leadership of the DPRK at a single stroke" are obviously offensive ones.
					
					 The aim of the drill is to put the DPRK into an unendurable position to facilitate its "collapse" and achieve the "German-style unification through absorption".
					
					 Xinhua News noted that the joint military drill the U.S. and south Korea stage every year, steadily escalating their scale, are increasing the possibility of military conflict on the Korean peninsula and threatening peace and stability in Northeast Asia.
					
					 An expert of California University said that the U.S. and south Korea should make a policy switchover, not clinging to muscle flexing causing military tension but recognizing the desire of the Korean people to live in peace.
					
					 As seen above, the joint military drill conducted by the U.S. is the root cause of disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The ultimate goal of the drill is to dominate the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The U.S. has long tailored all its moves for invading the DPRK to its scenario for dominating the world, regarding the peninsula as a region favorable for carrying out its strategy for establishing its hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. forces have gotten familiar with and rounded off the capabilities to carry out the strategy for domination through joint military rehearsals.
					
					 They are creating a vicious cycle of escalating tension through saber -rattling and massively introducing strategic assets into the peninsula and its vicinity under that pretext.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and creating instability in the region.
					
					 As the DPRK has strong self-defensive nuclear force, peace and security on the peninsula and in the region are firmly preserved despite the U.S. moves for aggression.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will strongly react to the U.S. hostile moves and nuclear threat including war drills by dint of its treasured sword--nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying DPRK as Power of Talents
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying DPRK as Power of Talents
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 39th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education". It calls for glorifying forever the DPRK as an icon of education and a power of talents.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Glorifying the DPRK as a power of talents is the work for carrying out the behests of the great leaders to add shine to their idea of prioritizing the education and their exploits, the work for upholding the Party policies and an important work for building a powerful socialist country as required by the age of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 It is, at the same time, a struggle to bring into full bloom the love of Marshal Kim Jong Un for the younger generation and the people across the country and give fuller play to the vitality of the most advantageous socialist educational system in the world.
					
					 The present era is the age of knowledge-based economy in which science and technology play a leading role in the social development and the one of prioritizing talents in which talents decide the national power and the development of economy and culture.
					
					 The building of a scientific and technological and economic power, highly civilized power as required by the age of knowledge-based economy does not pose as a problem and it is possible to achieve sustained development and prosperity in all fields if the country has just a large contingent of talents.
					
					  All officials and educators should bear in mind the Party's noble idea of prioritizing the younger generation and education, turn the country into a power of talents under the uplifted banner of creating the Mallima speed and thus make hurrah for the Workers' Party and socialism resound far and wide across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Monday dedicates an article to the 8th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might."
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), is a monumental work which comprehensively clarifies the high dignity, prestige and the source of invincible might of the DPRK and important guidelines to be held fast to in the struggle for the final victory in building a socialist power, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The eight years since the publication of the work are shining as a proud path along which a series of great victories and miracles unprecedented in the history of socialist construction have been brought about in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il steered the country to emerge a politico-ideological and military power by making a forced march day and night out of his ardent patriotism until the last moments of his life and laid down an eternal groundwork for a thriving country.
					
					 His cause of building a socialist power is making steady progress along the road of victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His experienced and veteran leadership serves as a driving force for making the country advance by leaps and bounds at the Mallima speed under the banner of Juche.
					
					 The wise leadership provided by him for developing the DPRK into the most powerful country in the world lies in that he is remarkably consolidating the single-minded unity based on the great revolutionary idea and spirit.
					
					 It also lies in that he is increasing the might of the military power in every way, regarding arms as an all-powerful treasured sword for final victory, and enabling the DPRK to shed eternal rays as a socialist power centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Reckless Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday carries a commentary as regards the end of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill, which pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to the uncontrollable danger of a nuclear war. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The joint military drill was aimed to carry out the phased scenario for invading the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. painted the UFG as "annual", "regular" and "defensive" one, but it could not cover up its aggressive and provocative nature.
					
					 The U.S. introduced nuclear strategic assets into the Korean peninsula and its vicinity ahead of the UFG.
					
					 B-52H, B-1B and B-2A nuclear strategic bombers for overseas aggression were forward-deployed on Guam for sorties.
					
					 It was as clear as noonday that the UFG was aimed to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK. Foreign experts shared such views.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent which the U.S. is touting as "threat" whenever it opens its mouth was built because of the U.S. nuclear threat, and the U.S. undisguised hostile policy toward the DPRK compelled it to bolster up its nuclear capability.
					
					 The U.S. is an aggressor and provocateur who has escalated the tension on the peninsula by persistently pursuing the anti-DPRK hostile policy aimed at bringing down its ideology and social system. 
					
					 Its attempt to bring down the DPRK by introducing huge armed forces and nuclear strategic assets is nothing but a daydream.
					
					 If the U.S. recklessly works to realize its foolish dream, oblivious of the DPRK's steadfast faith and serious warning, it will entail unimaginably disastrous consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Patronizing Criminal
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Patronizing Criminal
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea on September 1 accused the puppet authorities of patronizing U Pyong U, chief secretary for civil administration of Chongwadae.
					 It said Chongwadae is patronizing U and it has direct impact on the investigation by the prosecution.
					
					 In fact, the prosecution excepted U's house from the search and confiscation operation from the beginning and was reluctant to investigate the lawbreaking on the part of his wife's side, it charged.
					
					 Worse still, the confiscation of a hand phone of a reporter who was supposed to act a witness was an abuse of the right to investigation, an encroachment upon the freedom of speech, it deplored

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Iceland, Poland
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Iceland, Poland
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Iceland and Poland on August 30 and 31 to mark the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society said:
					
					 The coming September 9 marks the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK was a historic event which brought about a fundamental change in shaping the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il the DPRK performed great miracles and changes and turned into an invincible socialist fortress no one dares provoke.
					
					 The Korean people are registering great achievements in building an economic giant under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and other speakers said Korean socialism is, indeed, genuine socialism which regards the people as Heaven, praising the revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: UK Body on Future of Korea, Youth Power
articles.content:
UK Body on Future of Korea, Youth Power
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK posted an article titled "Youth power demonstrates might before world" on its website on August 25 on the Youth Day.
					 There are young people in any country of the world but no country puts forward the young people as the main players of the times as the DPRK, the article said.
					
					 This is evinced by the facts that young people recorded marks of clear conscience in the courses of the youth university set up by themselves while erecting the eternal dam as a symbol of the youth power in out-of-the way mountainous area, a young woman became a "girl mother" for orphans and millions of young people volunteer to the posts for defending the country under the grim situation, it noted.
					
					 To know only their leader and find honor, pride and happiness of youth in taking the lead in the drive to carry out his intention--this is the true picture of the young Korean people who have grown under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, the article pointed out.
					
					 Such a huge contingent of youth, warriors devotedly defending the leader have been trained under the loving care of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who prizes anything performed by the youth and puts forward them as pearls and gems by carrying forward the noble intention of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, it said.
					
					 The future of Korea, the youth power without an equal in the world, which is holding the peerlessly great man in high esteem, will shine forever with victory and glory.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Czech Republic, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Czech Republic, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in the Czech Republic and Bangladesh on August 30 and 31 to celebrate the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, the Bangladesh People's League, the Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, political parties, organizations for friendship and solidarity and Juche idea study organizations and masses.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 The history of the DPRK is the one of proud victory which has invariably taken the road of socialism under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, holding the great leaders in high esteem.
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine people's country which puts forward the popular masses as the masters of the state and society and serves them.
					
					 Invincible is the DPRK which is demonstrating its might with independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence, enjoying absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the C.C., the Czechoslovak Communist Party praised the DPRK as the beacon of hope of progressive mankind as it is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism, unfazed by any challenge of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League and other speakers highly praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for founding the DPRK and turning it into an invincible political and military power, expressing belief that the Korean people would register bigger successes in building a socialist power under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean Book, Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Fine Art Exhibition Opens in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A Korean book and fine art exhibition opened at Secondary School No. 5 of Khabarovsk City, Russia on September 1 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and fine art works associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials of the Khabarovsk City Administration, teachers and students of the school, citizens and officials of the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.

articles.title: Uruguayan Political Party Exposes S. Korean Authorities' Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Uruguayan Political Party Exposes S. Korean Authorities' Crimes against Humanity
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The March 26 Movement of Uruguay posted an article exposing the south Korean authorities' crimes against humanity on its website on August 29.
					 At a time when the Western media are resorting to accusations and false propaganda against the DPRK, it has been disclosed that concentration camps not opened to public exist in south Korea, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Even progressive activists and children with disabilities are forced to do labor in these concentration camps.
					
					 A medium reported that such concentration camps have existed in south Korea since the 1970s but have not yet been opened to public.
					
					 Shortly ago, tombs were discovered where bodies of people who were forced to do labor, until they were beaten to death, were buried.
					
					 There were in the tombs bodies of persons with disabilities, progressive activists, wandering women, workers and abductees.
					
					 Posted on the website were photos of children who are detained at the concentration camps and bodies which were discovered in the tombs.

articles.title: Russian Body Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
Russian Body Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK issued a statement on August 30 denouncing the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are resorting to war provocation against the DPRK in a bid to realize their ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is aimed to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are applying double standards to attain their goal.
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to block the economic development of the DPRK. But the DPRK is making eye-opening leap forward in building a socialist power.
					
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK fully supports all measures taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and dignity from the aggression moves of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la reunion nacional de activistas de planificacion
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la reunion nacional de activistas de planificacion
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion nacional de los activistas de planificacion.
					El foro hizo analisis y balance de los exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en la materializacion de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de planificacion de economia nacional y discutio las tareas y los remedios para llevar a una nueva etapa elevada la labor de planificacion elevando el papel de los funcionarios de direccion economica y de planificacion en la materializacion de la linea estrategica de la construccion de potencia economica y el inminente cumplimiento de la estrategia de plan quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional, presentados por la VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, No Kwang Chol, los vicepremieres Ri Mu Yong y Ko In Ho, los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, ministerios, organos centrales, y los organismos, fabricas, empresas y granjas de provincias, ciudades y distritos, y los funcionarios ejemplares de la rama. 
					
					O Su Yong, miembro de Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, transmitio la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un publicado el 3 de septiembre de 105 (2016) de la Era Juche "Mejorar e intensificar la labor de planificacion constituye la demanda apremiante para la construccion de potencia economica socialista".
					
					La obra sirve de la guia programatica a ser mantenida firmemente en acelerar la construccion de potencia economica desplegando mas la superioridad de la economica planificada socialista conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo y en lograr nuevos cambios revolucionarios de la planificacion de la economia nacional elevando la responsabilidad y el papel de los funcionarios de direccion economica y los de planificacion. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro de la RPDC.
					
					El informante dijo que en el periodo posterior a la liberacion del pais el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 6 de marzo de 1946 el primer organo de planificacion estatal en Corea a base de las preciosas experiencias adquiridas en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa, y condujo sabiamente sus labores preparando asi la base de eterna duracion para la planificacion de la economia nacional. 
					
					Puntualizo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il profundizo la original idea y teoria del Presidente en materia de la planificacion de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo, hizo mantener con firmeza la economia planificada socialista y preparo el trampolin para la construccion de potencia economica.
					
					Afirmo que gracias a la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un la planificacion de economia nacional entra hoy dia en nueva etapa elevada.
					
					Exhorto a todos los funcionarios de direccion economica y otros de planificacion a llevar a la realidad el proposito del Mariscal mediante la renovacion de las operaciones y mando economicos. 
					
					Los oradores llamaron a los funcionarios economicos a materializar estrictamente la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC tomando firmemente la orientacion del Partido sobre la planificacion de la economia nacional y registrando con la decision extraordinaria y la voluntad inflexible nuevos cambios en la planificacion para asi exaltar la gran era de Kim Jong Un que brilla con creaciones e innovaciones.

articles.title: Iniciada XII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Iniciada XII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la ceremonia inaugural de la XII Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang.
					En la ocasion participaron el vicepremier Ri Ryong Nam y Kim Yong Jae, ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Kim In Chol, vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la cuidad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de los sectores comerciales y economicos de la RPDC, las delegaciones de varios paises y regiones, los representantes diplomaticos y miembros de embajadas de varios paises acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Despues del discurso inaugural de Pak Ung Sik, presidente de la Agencia de Exposiciones Internacionales de Corea, hubo el discurso de felicitacion de O Ryong Chol, viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la exhibicion servira de una buena oportunidad para promover la amistad entre los paises y efectuar ampliamente los multilaterales negocios economicos y comerciales, las inversiones y el intercambio cientifico y tecnologico.
					
					Enfatizaron que seguiran ampliando y desarrollando las relaciones economicas y la cooperacion bilateral y multilateral con varios paises en el principio de igualdad y beneficios mutuos.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes vieron las mercancias exhibidas por las companias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Malasia, Mongolia, Singapur, China, Tailandia, Iran, Indonesia, Vietnam, Alemania, Rusia, Italia, Cuba, Nueva Zelanda, Australia y Taipei de China. 
					
					La exhibicion se realizara hasta el dia 8.

articles.title: En RPDC conmemora aniversario 70 de fundacion de revista "Mujer Coreana"
articles.content:
En RPDC conmemora aniversario 70 de fundacion de revista "Mujer Coreana"
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La revista "Mujer Coreana" acogio el 70o aniversario de su fundacion.
					  En todo el periodo de la revolucion y construccion, la revista cumplio magnificamente el deber como poderosa arma politica que impulsa el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del movimiento femenino coreano y como intimo amigo de las mujeres.
					
					  Despues de la liberacion de Corea, el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo editar la publicacion para las mujeres y puso a la revista el nombre "Mujer Coreana".
					
					  Desde el primer tiempo de la publicacion de dicha revista, la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa, Kim Jong Suk, condujo para que la revista desempenara su papel como publicacion para las mujeres.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il ilumino todos los problemas teorico-practicos para la construccion de la publicacion femenina revolucionaria incluyendo el de mejorar el contenido y forma de la edicion para mantener vivas las peculiaridades del organo del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea.
					
					  Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, esta revista acogio hoy la nueva era dorada de su desarrollo.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 5 el acto conmemorativo.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Il Hwan, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Sun, presidenta del CC de la UMDC, los periodistas y editores de la Editora de las Organizaciones de Trabajadores y las funcionarias de la UMDC.

articles.title: Se efectuara Seminario Internacional de Idea Juche en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Se efectuara Seminario Internacional de Idea Juche en Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Bajo auspicio del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, tendra lugar el dia 8 en esta capital el Seminario Internacional de Idea Juche sobre el independencia antiimperialista y la solidaridad en ocasion del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. En esta cita participaran las delegaciones y delegados de las organizaciones de estudios de idea Juche de varios paises y regiones.
					El seminario impulsara aun mas las actividades de estudio y divulgacion de la idea Juche y contribuira a fortalecer la solidaridad internacional entre los paises y pueblos que luchan por la realizacion de la causa antiimperialista e independiente.

articles.title: Llegan delegaciones y delegados de organizaciones de estudio de idea Juche
articles.content:
Llegan delegaciones y delegados de organizaciones de estudio de idea Juche 
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, arribaron este lunes a esta capital el subdirector general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Harish Gupta, y su comitiva, la delegacion de la Asociacion de Estudio de la Idea Juche de Rusia presidida por el presidente Dmitri Kostenko, la delegacion de la organizacion de estudio de la idea Juche de Mongolia encabezada por el presidente de la Asociacion Paektusan para el Desarrollo Independiente de Mongolia, Janchivdorjyn Lomvo, la delegacion del Foro de Literatura de Nepal para el Estudio de la Politica de Songun conducida por el presidente Sonkori Baroti, la delegacion de la Asociacion de Apoyo a la Politica de Songun de Nepal dirigida por el presidente Manik Lama, y la delegacion de la Organizacion para el Estudio de la Idea Juche de Tailandia presidida por el presidente Songchit Pullarp.

articles.title: Delegacion de Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea parte para Colombia
articles.content:
Delegacion de Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea parte para Colombia
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea encabezada por su vicepresidenta Chae Chun Hui partio el dia 5 de esta capital para participar en el XVI Congreso de la Federacion Democratica Internacional de Mujeres que tendra lugar en Colombia.
